### E2E Tests Created
**File**: `/home/pbrown/SkuInventory/tests/e2e/integrations-access.spec.ts`
**Tests**:
- Admin user sees Integrations link in sidebar
- Ops user does NOT see Integrations link in sidebar
- Viewer user does NOT see Integrations link in sidebar
- Sync logs API returns 403 for viewer user
- Sync logs API returns 200 for admin user
- Sync logs API returns 200 for ops user
- CSV upload GET returns 403 for viewer user
- CSV upload GET returns 200 for admin user
- CSV upload GET returns 200 for ops user
- ASIN mapping GET returns 200 for any authenticated user
- ASIN mapping POST rejects request from non-admin users
